Welcome to NucML’s documentation!¶

NucML is a python toolbox to aid the ML-enhanced Nuclear Data Evaluation pipeline.

OVERVIEW

  • What is NucML?

GET STARTED

  • Installation Guide
  • Basic Walkthrough

NAVIGATING THE NDE
